May 4, 2021
Organous
A piece that's easy to undervalue due to his underwhelming 10 attack and 17 defense. He's a nice collection of stuff. I would include him primarily as a Barrier piece. Sidestep is very helpful along that strategy. He's even useful in carrying people around with Underworld, another useful ability to pair with Sidestep. You're also getting a leader who might even provide other minotaurs. If he has to attack, you're in trouble, but 3 penetrating damage could certainly make him a big surprise.
